{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03309v1", "title": "Self-similar algebraic spiral vortex sheets of 2-D incompressible Euler
  equations", "summary": "This paper provides the first rigorous construction of the self-similar
algebraic spiral vortex sheet solutions to the 2-D incompressible Euler
equations. These solutions are believed to represent the typical roll-up
pattern of vortex sheets after the formation of curvature singularities. The
most challenging part of this paper is to handle the Cauchy integral for the
algebraic spiral curve, which falls outside the classical theory of singular
integral operators.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-06T08:42:29Z"}
